          <title>
            <string language="hu-HU">A csontváz</string>
            <string language="en-US">The Skeleton</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das Skelett</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le Squelette</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O Esqueleto</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Lo Scheletro</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ο σκελετός</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El Esqueleto</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu-HU</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu-HU">A csontok szerkezete és kapcsolódása; a koponya, a törzsváz és a végtagok; a vázrendszer elváltozásai, sérülései</string>
            <string language="en-US">Structure and Connection of Bones; the Skull, the Body And Limbs; Deformations and Injuries of the Skeletal System</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">biológia</string>
            <string language="en-US">biology</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">mozgás</string>
            <string language="en-US">motion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">csontváz</string>
            <string language="en-US">skeleton</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">csontok</string>
            <string language="en-US">bones</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Struktur und Anschluß der Knochen; der 
Schädel, der Körper und Glieder; Deformationen und 
Verletzungen des skelettartigen Systems</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Structure et connexion des os ; le crâne, 
le corps et membres ; Déformations et dommages du système 
squelettique</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Estrutura e conexão dos ossos; o skull, o 
corpo e membros; Deformações e ferimentos do sistema 
esqueletal</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Struttura e collegamento delle ossa; il 
cranio, il corpo e membra; Deformazioni e lesioni del sistema 
scheletrico</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δομή και σύνδεση των κόκκαλων  το κρανίο, το 
σώμα και τα άκρα  Παραμορφώσεις και τραυματισμοί του 
σκελετικού συστήματος</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Estructura y conexión de huesos; el 
cráneo, el cuerpo y miembros; Deformaciones y lesiones del 
sistema esquelético</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Biologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bewegung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
